# Copilot Instructions for NestJS Backend Template

## Project Overview
This is a professional, scalable NestJS backend template following clean architecture principles.

## Architecture Guidelines
- Follow Clean Architecture with clear separation of concerns
- Use Domain-Driven Design (DDD) principles
- Implement proper dependency injection
- Maintain SOLID principles throughout the codebase

## Code Standards
- Use TypeScript strict mode
- Implement comprehensive error handling
- Follow NestJS best practices for modules, controllers, and services
- Use proper validation with class-validator and class-transformer
- Implement authentication and authorization patterns

## Testing Guidelines
- Write unit tests for all business logic
- Implement integration tests for API endpoints
- Use Jest as the testing framework
- Maintain test coverage above 80%

## Documentation
- Document all public APIs
- Use JSDoc comments for complex functions
- Maintain up-to-date README files
